summary: Fast-talking wheeler-dealer Corporal King is stuck in a Malaysian P.O.W. camp during World War II and uses bribery and larceny to take de-facto control of the camp.
cast: George Segal|Tom Courtenay|James Fox|Patrick O'Neal|Denholm Elliott|James Donald|Todd Armstrong|John Mills|Gerald Sim|Leonard Rossiter|John Standing|Alan Webb|John Ronane|Sam Reese|Michael Lees|Wright King|Hamilton Dyce|Joe Turkel|John Merivale|Geoffrey Bayldon|Reg Lye|Arthur Malet|Hedley Mattingly|Dale Ishimoto|John Levingston|Teru Shimada|Richard Dawson|Michael Stroka|William Fawcett|Roy Duane|John Orchard|Laurence Conroy|John Warburton|David Haviland|Anthony Faramus|Dick Johnson|John Barclay|Edward Ashley|David Frankham|Louis Neervort|Bryan Forbes|Brian Gaffikin|Jimmie Horan|Dick Johnstone|Mathew McCue|George Pelling|Mickey Simpson
keywords: prisoner of war|malaya|prisoner of war camp|based on novel|army
title: King Rat
